alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 6:13PM MST until December 31 at 10:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, areas of blowing snow and light snowfall. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Island Park, Spencer, Dubois, and Small. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
